text: The Adventures of Quentin Durward, also known as Quentin Durward, is a 1955 British American adventure movie directed by Richard Thorpe and based on the 1923 novel of the same name by Sir Walter Scott. It stars Robert Taylor, George Cole, Kay Kendall, Robert Morley, John Carson, Harcourt Williams and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 movies Category:1955 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Thorpe Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 15th century
title: The Adventures of Quentin Durward
